"All the sites are safe," said Minister of Antiquities Zahi Hawass . Nothing stolen, nothing destroyed. With Zahi Hawass 's permission, veteran foreign correspondent Jeffrey Bartholet, on assignment for National Geographic magazine, was able to visit Saqqara, some 18 miles south of Cairo.
